issues.description: The getter for the `quantity` field in `StockIngredient` is named `retrieveQuantity()` in the template repository, while both the `Main.java` usage and the solution repository use `getQuantity()`. This inconsistency in naming the same conceptual getter method forces students to maintain two different names for the same operation, causing confusion when mapping the problemâ€™s example and solution code to the provided template.
issues.suggested_fix: Rename the `retrieveQuantity()` method in `StockIngredient` to `getQuantity()` (or add a `getQuantity()` alias that calls `retrieveQuantity()`), so that all artifacts consistently refer to the getter as `getQuantity()`.
